DOC.brief_title: Effect Intense Pulse Light ( IPL ) Treatment Tear Film Osmolarity
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective study design among subject MGD qualify IPL therapy . Study test do baseline visit subject schedule IPL therapy . Measurements make day 15 ( prior second IPL sit ) , Day 45 ( prior third IPL setting ) , Day 75 ( fourth IPL setting ) Day 105 need ( 30 day IPL set 4 ) . Subjects willing come follow visit schedule may instill artificial tear 2 hour prior study measurement . No history ocular infection corneal degeneration/dystrophy No history corneal refractive surgery and/or change ocular medication last 2 month
DOC.criteria: Dry eye MGD No history ocular infection corneal degeneration/dystrophy No history corneal refractive surgery No change ocular medication last 2 month
